{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Alpha Telecom |model=3100-4g |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/29/2008 |manuf_country= |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=RAXAR4505NWB |ic_id=4711A-AR4505NWB |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1350A |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''ADSL Router with 4-Port LAN Switch and 802.11g WLAN'' / '''Arion 3100-4g'''
[http://www.alpha-tele.com/web/html/arion_3100-4g.html Product page] :[http://www.alpha-tele.com/web/arion3100-4.pdf Manual] The default IP is 192.168.2.1 per '''Alpha-Telecom''''s manual. The default password is ''blank''. OUIs for this device may include 00:06:D3 (it's on a MAC label affixed to the Ethernet port casing in the FCC internal photos).
